appName: Animal Hunter VR: Wild Shooting Games
displayName: Animal Hunter VR: Wild Shooting Games
display_name: Animal Hunter VR: Wild Shooting Games
display_long_description:
Animal Hunter VR: The Ultimate Safari Adventure
Immerse yourself in the thrill of the wild with Animal Hunter VR, the most realistic and exhilarating hunting experience on Meta Quest. Explore vast, breathtakingly realistic environments, from the scorching savannas of Africa to the lush forests of North America.

Encounter Majestic Animals
Get up close and personal with a diverse range of majestic animals, each with their unique behaviors, habitats, and characteristics. From the mighty lion and elephant to the agile deer and bear, every encounter is a thrilling opportunity to observe, learn, and hunt.

Features:
Realistic Environments: Explore vast, meticulously crafted ecosystems, complete with authentic sounds, textures, and weather effects.
Diverse Animal Encounters: Interact with a wide range of majestic animals, each with their unique behaviors, habitats, and characteristics.
Immersive Hunting Mechanics: Master a range of hunting tools, each with its unique mechanics and challenges.
Challenging Missions: Take on a range of challenging missions that test your skills, strategy, and knowledge.
Realistic Sound Design: Immerse yourself in an authentic audio environment.

Get Ready for a Wild Adventure!
Download Animal Hunter VR now and experience the ultimate hunting adventure on Meta Quest. With its realistic environments, diverse animal encounters, and immersive hunting mechanics, Animal Hunter VR is the perfect game for anyone who loves the thrill of the wild.
